channel.title: About the Wish List category
channel.description:
A place to make your wishes known: you can ask for language features, libraries, extensions, etc.
If there's to be some consideration behind the request (e.g. money), post instead in [Community/Jobs](/c/community/jobs).

A place to make your wishes known: you can ask for language features, libraries, extensions, etc.

If there's to be some consideration behind the request (e.g. money), post instead in Community/Jobs.
